headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Sunday Drivers Week: 50% Off Upgrades & More at Benny's  (Sept 2 - 8)
content:
In order to look fresh and remain competitive, cruise down to Strawberry where there are all kinds of discounts happening at Benny's Original Motor Works, starting with 50% off all upgrades. He's also slashed prices on everything from Hydraulics to Wheels.

See rockstargames.com/newswire for all the details.
